trans-unit.source: Represents the writer of the message body.
A message consists of headers and a body.
trans-unit.target: 消息由标头和正文组成。

trans-unit.source: The headers are buffered and the body is streamed.
trans-unit.target: 标头将进行缓冲，正文进行流处理。

trans-unit.source: Because the body is streamed, the user cannot pass the actual content of the body to a message.
trans-unit.target: 由于正文进行流处理，用户无法将正文的实际内容传递到消息。

trans-unit.source: Instead the user must pass a class that knows how to write the body when asked to do so.
trans-unit.target: 当要求用户传递内容时，用户必须传递一个知道如何写入正文的类。

trans-unit.source: This is done by passing a class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>.
trans-unit.target: 此工作通过将一个派生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> 的类传递到 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> 来实现。

trans-unit.source: A message calls the class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> whenever it requires the body to be written using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 每当要求使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> 写入正文时，消息都调用派生自 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> 的类。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to derive a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> 派生类。

trans-unit.source: This override takes in an array of strings and writes them to a <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 此重写接收一个字符串数组，然后将其写入 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the body writer can be called multiple times; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter" /> class that explicitly indicates whether to buffer.
If `isBuffered` is `false` then the message calls the write method once and buffers the contents.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `isBuffered` 为 `false`，则消息调用一次写入方法并缓冲内容。

trans-unit.source: The writer.
The callback.
The state.
Starts to write body contents for the body writer with specified writer, callback and state.
The result of the operation.
The maximum size of the buffer for the body.
Creates a buffered copy of the body.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter" /> that contains a copy of this object.
If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.IsBuffered%2A> is `true` then the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> object is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.IsBuffered%2A> 为 `true`，则返回 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.IsBuffered%2A> is `false` then the contents of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> up to `maxBufferSize` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.IsBuffered%2A> 为 `false`，则返回 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> 的最大大小为 `maxBufferSize` 的内容。

trans-unit.source: This also calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.OnCreateBufferedCopy%28System.Int32%29> as an extensibility point.
trans-unit.target: 还将调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.OnCreateBufferedCopy%28System.Int32%29> 作为可扩展点。

trans-unit.source: The following sample shows how to create a buffered copy of an existing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> instance.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建现有 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> 实例的缓冲副本。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="maxBufferSize" /> is less than zero.
The body has already been written and cannot be written again, or the body writer is not buffered.
The result of the operation.
Ends the writing of body contents.
Gets a value that indicates whether the write method can be called multiple times.
<see langword="true" /> if the body writer can be called multiple times; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以多次调用正文编写器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If `isBuffered` is `false` then the message calls the write method once and buffers the contents.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `isBuffered` 为 `false`，则消息调用一次写入方法并缓冲内容。

trans-unit.source: The writer
The callback
The state.
Raises an event when the body writer starts to write body contents with specified writer, callback and state.
The asynchronous result.
The maximum size of the buffer for the body.
Provides an extensibility point when the body contents are written.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter" /> with the specified maximum buffer size.
A class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> can override this method to create a buffered copy of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 派生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> 的类可以重写此方法以创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> 的缓冲副本。

trans-unit.source: But the default implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.WriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29>, so overriding just <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> should be easier and work for most scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 但 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.WriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> 的默认实现调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29>，因此仅重写 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> 应更容易，且适合大多数情况。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> returned must be buffered, that is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.IsBuffered%2A> must be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，必须缓冲返回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter>，即 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.IsBuffered%2A> 必须为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The result of the operation.
Raises an event when the body writer ends writing body contents.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> used to write out the message body.
When implemented, provides an extensibility point when the body contents are written.
This method must be implemented by classes derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法必须由派生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> 的类实现。

trans-unit.source: This is the key method that writes the body.
trans-unit.target: 这是写入正文的关键方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter> is buffered then this method is called only once.
trans-unit.target: 如果缓冲 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter>，则仅调用一次此方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates an override of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> 方法的重写。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> used to write out the message body.
Writes out the contents of the message body.

The default implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.WriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29>, so overriding <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> provides the best point of extension.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.WriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> 的默认实现调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29>，因此重写 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> 提供最佳可扩展点。

trans-unit.source: The following sample shows how to call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.WriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BodyWriter.WriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
